attributes.action: lobby the Boards of MK Dons FC and Luton Town FC to commence talks on a possible merger
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned urge the Prime Minister to lobby the Boards of MK Dons FC and Luton Town FC to commence talks on a possible merger, and to make clear the potential benefits to both Clubs that a relocation of Luton Town FC would bring. These include: enhanced facilities for players and supporters, a wider support base and a final solution to the ongoing search for a new ground for Luton Town FC. The combined club would benefit from economies of scale, a wider 'catchment' area, and greater commercial presence in Milton Keynes, one of the fastest growing conurbations in the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
